data.eml:eml: The Taiwan Breeding Bird Survey Data

The Taiwan Breeding Bird Survey (BBS Taiwan) is a national monitoring project with the aim of establishing a breeding bird population index for conservation. It was established in 2009 as a citizen science project with a cross-organizational working group. The BBS Taiwan has obtained 325,938 records of bird sampling data from 480 sampling sites during the breeding season in Taiwan from 2009 to 2016.
